---
id: postman
title: Postman Collection
---

We provide a postman collection to test all our api endpoints right away.

A sample test API key, Community ID, API Payment ID are included in the collection below, so you can test right away.

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/47b5c2b212ca7ab0e628#?env%5BStaging%)
:::caution
To test requests using your account, replace the values inside the imported staging environment with your values created from following the api refrenece steps.
:::
